Summary: multiple glowing orange orbs over the gulf near dauphin island
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dauphin Island
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were in a boat fishing in the gulf near dauphin island and a giant bright glowing orange orb appeared for about 3 minutes then disappeared. about 2 minutes later several smaller orange orbs appeared all over the sky and some split into 2 or more different orbs. this went on for 35 to 45 minuted then the coast guard helicopters flew over hear at high rate of speed going in the orb;s direction with their spot lights on. about 2 minutes 2 navy fighter with after burners on passed over head at a very high rate of speed moving to the direction of the orbs.... then they disappeared.
